scripts.build:apitypes: npx rimraf selling-partner-api-models && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/amzn/selling-partner-api-models.git && npx dtsgenerator --out ./src/api-types.d.ts selling-partner-api-models/models/**/*.json && npx rimraf selling-partner-api-models && echo export default Definitions; >> ./src/api-types.d.ts
